natech.title: Software Developer
natech.description:
Internal platform development
• Develop and maintain an internal platform using Azure DevOps, C#, .NET, Blazor WebAssembly, and SignalR for real-time features.
• Integrate authentication and authorization using OpenID Connect and OAuth2, ensuring secure user access.
• Leverage Docker for containerized deployments and MassTransit with RabbitMQ and Azure Service Bus for robust message queue management.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless platform integration and functionality.
• Implement security measures to protect sensitive data and maintain compliance with industry standards.

exelia.title: Software Developer
exelia.description:
Responsible for the development, deployment, and maintenance of multiple software projects using the modern .NET ecosystem, Azure services, and front-end technologies.
Doctor’s virtual assistant platform
• Developed a C# .NET 8 FastEndpoints API integrating Google APIs for speech to text features and OpenAI API for insights summarization 
• Utilized Azure SQL Database and Blob Storage for data persistence 
• Hangfire and Quartz for scheduled tasks 
• Notification system with SingalR
• Leveraged React in the front-end, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Email campaign management platform
• Enhanced a C# .NET 6 Web API integrating Google APIs via OAuth 2.0 for email management.
• Utilized Azure SQL Database for data persistence, WebJobs for scheduled tasks and Azure Service Bus for message queue management.
• Used React in the front-end, ensuring a responsive and user-friendly interface.
Shipping procurement management platform
• Developed .NET 7 microservices utilizing Clean Architecture, CQRS, and Mediator patterns for improved modularity and scalability, exposing them services through an Ocelot API Gateway.
• Used MassTransit with RabbitMQ for messaging between microservices.
• Managed deployment via Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines to Azure VM.
Utilities resource management platform
• Modernized a C# .NET 6 Web API • Implemented HangFire for scheduled tasks
• Utilized Azure SQL Database and ElasticSearch for large datasets
• Developed front-end using Angular and deployed to Azure with BitBucket CI/CD
Fuel and lubricants management platform
• Refactored and augmented .NET 8 Razor Pages web application
• Incorporated HangFire for scheduled tasks • Utilized jQuery and JavaScript for front-end
• Integrated Azure SQL Database and Azure Blob Storage

arhs.title: Software Developer
arhs.description:
Focused on the development and maintenance of enterprise-level web applications using ASP.NET Core MVC and Azure DevOps for CI/CD.
IT infrastructure resources management platform
• Implemented ASP.NET Core MVC architecture
• Utilized DevExtreme, jQuery, and Vanilla JavaScript for front-end
• Incorporated SQL Server database • Developed .NET Core Web API for external exposure
• Developed a C# Console App for scheduled tasks • Extended existing CI/CD on Azure DevOps
• Integrated two-way synchronization with Azure DevOps for Work Items and Azure Wiki Pages

freelance.title: Freelance Software Developer
freelance.description:
Provided custom solutions focusing on web development, API integration, and cloud deployment.
•Development of a solution that consists of a SSR Astro.js app along with Strapi CMS for content management and Postgresql for data persistance that are hosted in a VPS as Docker containers in order to present the services provided by a restaurant.
•Development of a C# .Net 6 Blazor WebAssembly with MVU architecture, that integrated a custom HttpClient SDK that is used to manipulate, present and manage data in a NoSQL database, it was hosted using Azure Static Web App service and deployed through GitHub Actions CI/CD, finally I implemented a Two Factor SMS Authentication with OTP.
•Development of a discord chatting bot with C# and Discord.Net for internal usage at a gaming discord server, API exposure to their existing site. and completed tasks requested by the server community and GoogleSheet as database.
•Programmed simulations and visualizations to represent microclimate changes for urban design and prove that the outcome would be beneficial for sustainability.
•Development of a project that is meant to be used for wedding invitations in digital form. It consists of a web app in Blazor WebAssembly, an API in .Net 6 and GoogleSheet as a database. It is deployed through Github Actions CI/CD and it is hosted in Azure, the Web API project as an App Service and the client web app as Static Web App Service.

programmer.title: Programmer Internship
programmer.description: •Modification and programming of a fitness tracker chip board altering its functionality so that it can measure optical density on liquid solutions.

thesis.title: Master's Thesis
thesis.description: •Research on biodegradation of weathered polypropylene microplastic in marine microcosm environment.

internship.title: Engineer Internship
internship.description: •Completed my internship as an Engineer in Maritime Museum of Crete researching on degradation of building materials in coastal areas caused by the marine environment.

energy.title: Semester Project
energy.description: •Developed simulations and visualizations to evaluate the energy consumption and requirements of buildings based on different materials using python and matplotlib.

army.title: Army Services
army.description: •Completed my compulsary Army Duties as a paratrooper.

izmir.title: Exchange Program
izmir.description: •Took part in Erasmus + Student Exchange Program in Ege University of Izmir.

university.title: Enrolled in University
university.description: •MSc in Chemical and Environmental Engineering, 5 year's study curriculum.
